text: The 2009–10 season was Hartlepool United's 101st year in existence and their third consecutive season in League One. Along with competing in League One, the club also participated in the FA Cup, League Cup and League Trophy. The season covers the period from 1 July 2009 to 30 June 2010. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ==Transfers== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%; text-align: center;" |- !
